Hello everyone!

As I'm currently stuck with my 2-degrees-of-freedom arm an=
d running 
out of good ideas, I thought it might be helpful to analyze 
dif=
ferent, well-established experiments in order to gain new 
perspectives and=
 maybe find out, why other people's experiments work 
so well in contrast t=
o mine. Pole Balancing (which I know is included 
with C+ NEAT) would be a =
great start for me, but shame on me, I don't 
know C+, only Java and theref=
ore am using Ugo's JNEAT. That's when 
you guys come into play. ;-)
I hope =
some of you already tried single- or double pole balancing 
with Java, so m=
y question is the following: Would someone be so kind

/ let me try out his pole balancing experiment?
